Constructor Detail

EmbreoTreeCellRenderer

public EmbreoTreeCellRenderer(EmbreoAppList applist)
Add tooltips to cells in a tree. The list of applications, in the extended form, is a Hashtable with the application name as the key and a description as the value, so the renderer adds the value as the tooltip for the key.

Parameters:
applist - The list of applications

thisNodeTitle

protected java.lang.String thisNodeTitle(java.lang.Object value)
Gets the title of the node. Should correspond to the name of the program in the tree.
